physical_appearance: The image shows a black-and-white photograph. It is rectangular and it features a group of four soldiers. They are all dressed in military uniforms. The man who is second from the left is the only one wearing shorts while the others are wearing trousers. All of them are looking in the direction where the photograph was captured. They are leaning on the balustrade, which is also surmounting some potted plants. There are trees and greenery in the background.
title_text: Robert Arthur Polglaze and Three Other Military Personnel Photography Album (donation from Anthony Robert Saint Claire)
subject_terms_2: Black-and-white photography Portraits, Group Portrait photography Soldiers
